---
category: news
title: "Automatic deep-learning AI tool measures volume of cerebral ventricles on MRIs in children"
excerpt: "Researchers from multiple institutions in North America have developed a fully automated, deep-learning (DL), artificial-intelligence clinical tool that can measure the volume of cerebral ventricles on magnetic resonance images (MRIs) in children within about 25 minutes."
